title: Dating Diaries
description: Ghosting, bad dates, and awkward moments. Expose your love life.

cards.content: Never have I ever ghosted someone I dated for more than a month.
Never have I ever snooped through a partnerâ€™s phone.
Never have I ever lied about my height/age on a dating app.
Never have I ever been stood up on a date.
Never have I ever dated a friend's ex.
Never have I ever cried on a first date.
Never have I ever used an old photo on a dating profile.
Never have I ever forgotten my date's name.
Never have I ever had a crush on a teacher.
Never have I ever stalked an ex on social media.
Never have I ever cheated on a partner.
Never have I ever been cheated on.
Never have I ever dated two people at the same time.
Never have I ever said 'I love you' and didn't mean it.
Never have I ever broken up with someone over text.
Never have I ever been catfished.
Never have I ever stayed in a relationship because I didn't want to be alone.
Never have I ever kissed someone with bad breath.
Never have I ever fallen in love at first sight.
Never have I ever had a crush on a friend's parent.
Never have I ever slid into the DMs of a stranger.
Never have I ever hooked up with an ex.
Never have I ever faked being busy to avoid a date.
Never have I ever flirted with someone to get something free.
Never have I ever had a rebound relationship.
Never have I ever used someone for a free meal.
Never have I ever dated someone just because they had a car.
Never have I ever blocked an ex immediately after breaking up.
Never have I ever been the 'other man/woman'.
Never have I ever sent a screenshot of a conversation to the person I was talking to.
Never have I ever laughed during a kiss.
Never have I ever told someone I wasn't ready for a relationship, then dated someone else.
Never have I ever unmatched someone because of their opening message.
Never have I ever pretended to like a band/movie to impress a date.
Never have I ever gone on a blind date.
Never have I ever dated a coworker.
Never have I ever kissed someone and instantly regretted it.
Never have I ever had a friend break up with someone for me.
Never have I ever checked a partner's location.
Never have I ever accidentally called a partner by an ex's name.
Never have I ever written a love letter.
Never have I ever been proposed to.
Never have I ever lied about my number of past partners.
Never have I ever dated someone my friends hated.
Never have I ever had a public breakup.
Never have I ever made a fake profile to test a partner.
Never have I ever dated someone purely for their looks.
Never have I ever kept a gift from an ex.
Never have I ever gone through an ex's new partner's social media.
Never have I ever tried speed dating.
Never have I ever left a date in the middle of it.
Never have I ever hooked up with a roommate.
Never have I ever cried over a celebrity relationship ending.
Never have I ever had a crush on a friend.
Never have I ever friend-zoned someone.
Never have I ever been friend-zoned.
Never have I ever used a cheesy pickup line unironically.
Never have I ever edited my text to an ex 5 times before sending.
Never have I ever fallen for a pyramid scheme pitch on a date.
Never have I ever thought I was going to marry the person I dated in high school.
